root.description: OverviewTommy Tronic is a platformer developed by Oasis Games and published by Interplay for the PC platform.PC System RequirementsOS: XP, Vista, Win 7Processor: 1 GB or higherMemory: 512mbGraphics: GeForce 2 (32mb) equivalent or higherDirectXÂ®: 7 or higherHard Drive: 80mbSound: Windows compatible sound card
